thread.title: Greece Overhauls Licensing of Private TV Broadcasting
thread.title_full: Greece Overhauls Licensing of Private TV Broadcasting - WSJ

author: Nektaria Stamouli
title: Greece Overhauls Licensing of Private TV Broadcasting
text:
ATHENS—Greece’s parliament late on Saturday passed an overhaul of the country’s licensing system for private television, a reform the governing left-wing Syriza party sees as part of its quest to take on Greece’s business oligarchs.
The new legislation dictates, among other things, how TV broadcast licenses will be issued, for how long they would... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
